name: Bulbasaur
entry: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

name: Ivysaur
entry: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
entry: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
entry: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

name: Charmeleon
entry: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

name: Charizard
entry: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
entry: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
entry: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
entry: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
entry: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
entry: Edge_case

name: Butterfree
entry: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
entry: Edge_case

name: Kakuna
entry: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: Beedrill
entry: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

name: Pidgey
entry: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
entry: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

name: Pidgeot
entry: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

name: Rattata
entry: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: Raticate
entry: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

name: Spearow
entry: Eats bugs in grassy areas. It has to flap its short wings at high speed to stay airborne.

name: Fearow
entry: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
entry: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

name: Arbok
entry: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

name: Pikachu
entry: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

name: Raichu
entry: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

name: Sandshrew
entry: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Sandslash
entry: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
entry: Edge_case

name: Nidorina
entry: The female’s horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

name: Nidoqueen
entry: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

name: Nidoran♂
entry: Edge_case

name: Nidorino
entry: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: Nidoking
entry: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey’s bones.

name: Clefairy
entry: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: Clefable
entry: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
entry: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

name: Ninetales
entry: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

name: Jigglypuff
entry: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
entry: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: Zubat
entry: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Golbat
entry: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
entry: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

name: Gloom
entry: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn’t drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

name: Vileplume
entry: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
entry: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
entry: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: Venonat
entry: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
entry: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

name: Diglett
entry: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
entry: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
entry: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
entry: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
entry: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

name: Golduck
entry: Often seen swimming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

name: Mankey
entry: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
entry: Edge_case

name: Growlithe
entry: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

name: Arcanine
entry: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
entry: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: Poliwhirl
entry: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
entry: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
entry: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

name: Kadabra
entry: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

name: Alakazam
entry: Its brain can outperform a supercomputer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

name: Machop
entry: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: Machoke
entry: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
entry: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: Bellsprout
entry: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

name: Weepinbell
entry: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

name: Victreebel
entry: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

name: Tentacool
entry: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: Tentacruel
entry: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
entry: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
entry: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: Golem
entry: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

name: Ponyta
entry: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: Rapidash
entry: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
entry: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

name: Slowbro
entry: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE’s tail is said to feed on the host’s left over scraps.

name: Magnemite
entry: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

name: Magneton
entry: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

name: Farfetch'd
entry: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

name: Doduo
entry: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

name: Dodrio
entry: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

name: Seel
entry: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: Dewgong
entry: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: Grimer
entry: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
entry: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

name: Shellder
entry: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

name: Cloyster
entry: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

name: Gastly
entry: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Haunter
entry: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: Gengar
entry: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: Onix
entry: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

name: Drowzee
entry: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

name: Hypno
entry: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

name: Krabby
entry: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

name: Kingler
entry: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

name: Voltorb
entry: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

name: Electrode
entry: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

name: Exeggcute
entry: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

name: Exeggutor
entry: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

name: Cubone
entry: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON’s real face.

name: Marowak
entry: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: Hitmonlee
entry: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

name: Hitmonchan
entry: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: Lickitung
entry: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon’s. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

name: Koffing
entry: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: Weezing
entry: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

name: Rhyhorn
entry: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: Rhydon
entry: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: Chansey
entry: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

name: Tangela
entry: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

name: Kangaskhan
entry: Edge_case

name: Horsea
entry: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
entry: Capable of swimming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

name: Goldeen
entry: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: Seaking
entry: Edge_case

name: Staryu
entry: An enigmatic POKéMON that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

name: Starmie
entry: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Mr. Mime
entry: Edge_case

name: Scyther
entry: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: Jynx
entry: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: Electabuzz
entry: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
entry: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

name: Pinsir
entry: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

name: Tauros
entry: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: Magikarp
entry: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

name: Gyarados
entry: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: Lapras
entry: A POKéMON that has been overhunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

name: Ditto
entry: Capable of copying an enemy’s genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

name: Eevee
entry: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

name: Vaporeon
entry: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid’s.

name: Jolteon
entry: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.

name: Flareon
entry: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

name: Porygon
entry: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
entry: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

name: Omastar
entry: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

name: Kabuto
entry: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

name: Kabutops
entry: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

name: Aerodactyl
entry: A ferocious, prehistoric POKéMON that goes for the enemy’s throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

name: Snorlax
entry: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: Articuno
entry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: Zapdos
entry: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
entry: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

name: Dratini
entry: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

name: Dragonair
entry: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: Dragonite
entry: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

name: Mewtwo
entry: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

name: Mew
entry: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.

name: Chikorita
entry: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun’s rays.

name: Bayleef
entry: The scent of spices comes from around its neck. Somehow, sniffing it makes you want to fight.

name: Meganium
entry: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

name: Cyndaquil
entry: It is timid, and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

name: Quilava
entry: Be careful if it turns its back during battle. It means that it will attack with the fire on its back.

name: Typhlosion
entry: If its rage peaks, it becomes so hot that anything that touches it will instantly go up in flames.

name: Totodile
entry: Its well-developed jaws are powerful and capable of crushing anything. Even its trainer must be careful.

name: Croconaw
entry: If it loses a fang, a new one grows back in its place. There are always 48 fangs lining its mouth.

name: Feraligatr
entry: When it bites with its massive and powerful jaws, it shakes its head and savagely tears its victim up.

name: Sentret
entry: A very cautious POKéMON, it raises itself up using its tail to get a better view of its surroundings.

name: Furret
entry: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other POKéMON to enter.

name: Hoothoot
entry: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

name: Noctowl
entry: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

name: Ledyba
entry: It is very timid. It will be afraid to move if it is alone. But it will be active if it is in a group.

name: Ledian
entry: When the stars flicker in the night sky, it flutters about, scattering a glowing powder.

name: Spinarak
entry: It lies still in the same pose for days in its web, waiting for its unsuspecting prey to wander close.

name: Ariados
entry: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It is hard to tell which end is which.

name: Crobat
entry: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

name: Chinchou
entry: It shoots positive and negative electricity between the tips of its two antennae and zaps its enemies.

name: Lanturn
entry: The light it emits is so bright that it can illuminate the sea’s surface from a depth of over three miles.

name: Pichu
entry: It is not yet skilled at storing electricity. It may send out a jolt if amused or startled.

name: Cleffa
entry: Because of its unusual, star-like silhouette, people believe that it came here on a meteor.

name: Igglybuff
entry: It has a very soft body. If it starts to roll, it will bounce all over and be impossible to stop.

name: Togepi
entry: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

name: Togetic
entry: They say that it will appear before kindhearted, caring people and shower them with happiness.

name: Natu
entry: Because its wings aren’t yet fully grown, it has to hop to get around. It is always staring at something.

name: Xatu
entry: They say that it stays still and quiet because it is seeing both the past and future at the same time.

name: Mareep
entry: If static electricity builds in its body, its fleece doubles in volume. Touching it will shock you.

name: Flaaffy
entry: As a result of storing too much electricity, it developed patches where even downy wool won’t grow.

name: Ampharos
entry: The tail’s tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It acts as a beacon for lost people.

name: Bellossom
entry: BELLOSSOM gather at times and appear to dance. They say that the dance is a ritual to summon the sun.

name: Marill
entry: The tip of its tail, which contains oil that is lighter than water, lets it swim without drowning.

name: Azumarill
entry: By keeping still and listening intently, it can tell what is in even wild, fast-moving rivers.

name: Sudowoodo
entry: Although it always pretends to be a tree, its composition appears to be closer to a rock than a plant.

name: Politoed
entry: If POLIWAG and POLIWHIRL hear its echoing cry, they respond by gathering from far and wide.

name: Hoppip
entry: Edge_case

name: Skiploom
entry: The bloom on top of its head opens and closes as the temperature fluctuates up and down.

name: Jumpluff
entry: Once it catches the wind, it deftly controls its cotton-puff spores to float, even around the world.

name: Aipom
entry: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

name: Sunkern
entry: It may drop out of the sky suddenly. If attacked by a SPEAROW, it will violently shake its leaves.

name: Sunflora
entry: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.

name: Yanma
entry: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.

name: Wooper
entry: This POKéMON lives in cold water. It will leave the water to search for food when it gets cold outside.

name: Quagsire
entry: This carefree POKéMON has an easy-going nature. While swimming, it always bumps into boat hulls.

name: Espeon
entry: It uses the fine hair that covers its body to sense air currents and predict its enemy’s actions.

name: Umbreon
entry: When agitated, this POKéMON protects itself by spraying poisonous sweat from its pores.

name: Murkrow
entry: Feared and loathed by many, it is believed to bring misfortune to all those who see it at night.

name: Slowking
entry: It has incredible intellect and intuition. Whatever the situation, it remains calm and collected.

name: Misdreavus
entry: It likes playing mischievous tricks such as screaming and wailing to startle people at night.

name: Unown
entry: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

name: Wobbuffet
entry: It hates light and shock. If attacked, it inflates its body to pump up its counterstrike.

name: Girafarig
entry: Its tail has a small brain of its own. Beware! If you get close, it may react to your scent and bite.

name: Pineco
entry: It likes to make its shell thicker by adding layers of tree bark. The additional weight doesn’t bother it.

name: Forretress
entry: Its entire body is shielded by a steel-hard shell. What lurks inside the armor is a total mystery.

name: Dunsparce
entry: When spotted, this POKéMON escapes backward by furiously boring into the ground with its tail.

name: Gligar
entry: It flies straight at its target’s face then clamps down on the startled victim to inject poison.

name: Steelix
entry: Its body has been compressed deep under the ground. As a result, it is even harder than a diamond.

name: Snubbull
entry: Although it looks frightening, it is actually kind and affectionate. It is very popular among women.

name: Granbull
entry: It is actually timid and easily spooked. If attacked, it flails about to fend off its attacker.

name: Qwilfish
entry: To fire its poison spikes, it must inflate its body by drinking over 2.6 gallons of water all at once.

name: Scizor
entry: It swings its eye-patterned pincers up to scare its foes. This makes it look like it has three heads.

name: Shuckle
entry: Edge_case

name: Heracross
entry: This powerful POKéMON thrusts its prized horn under its enemies’ bellies then lifts and throws them.

name: Sneasel
entry: Its paws conceal sharp claws. If attacked, it suddenly extends the claws and startles its enemy.

name: Teddiursa
entry: Edge_case

name: Ursaring
entry: Although it is a good climber, it prefers to snap trees with its forelegs and eat fallen BERRIES.

name: Slugma
entry: It never sleeps. It has to keep moving because if it stopped, its magma body would cool and harden.

name: Magcargo
entry: The shell on its back is just skin that has cooled and hardened. It breaks easily with a slight touch.

name: Swinub
entry: It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

name: Piloswine
entry: Because the long hair all over its body obscures its sight, it just keeps charging repeatedly.

name: Corsola
entry: It continuously sheds and grows. The tip of its head is prized as a treasure for its beauty.

name: Remoraid
entry: It has superb accuracy. The water it shoots out can strike even moving prey from more than 300 feet.

name: Octillery
entry: It traps enemies with its suction-cupped tentacles then smashes them with its rock-hard head.

name: Delibird
entry: It carries food all day long. There are tales about lost people who were saved by the food it had.

name: Mantine
entry: As it majestically swims, it doesn’t care if REMORAID attach to it for scavenging its leftovers.

name: Skarmory
entry: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

name: Houndour
entry: It uses different kinds of cries for communicating with others of its kind and for pursuing its prey.

name: Houndoom
entry: If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its mouth, the pain will never go away.

name: Kingdra
entry: It is said that it usually hides in underwater caves. It can create whirlpools by yawning.

name: Phanpy
entry: It swings its long snout around playfully, but because it is so strong, that can be dangerous.

name: Donphan
entry: It has sharp, hard tusks and a rugged hide. Its TACKLE is strong enough to knock down a house.

name: Porygon2
entry: This upgraded version of PORYGON is designed for space exploration. It can’t fly, though.

name: Stantler
entry: The curved antlers subtly change the flow of air to create a strange space where reality is distorted.

name: Smeargle
entry: A special fluid oozes from the tip of its tail. It paints the fluid everywhere to mark its territory.

name: Tyrogue
entry: It is always bursting with energy. To make itself stronger, it keeps on fighting even if it loses.

name: Hitmontop
entry: If you become enchanted by its smooth, elegant, dance-like kicks, you may get drilled hard.

name: Smoochum
entry: Its lips are the most sensitive parts on its body. It always uses its lips first to examine things.

name: Elekid
entry: It rotates its arms to generate electricity, but it tires easily, so it charges up only a little bit.

name: Magby
entry: Each and every time it inhales and exhales, hot embers dribble out of its mouth and nostrils.

name: Miltank
entry: Its milk is packed with nutrition, making it the ultimate beverage for the sick or weary.

name: Blissey
entry: Anyone who takes even one bite of BLISSEY’s egg becomes unfailingly caring and pleasant to everyone.

name: Raikou
entry: The rain clouds it carries let it fire thunderbolts at will. They say that it descended with lightning.

name: Entei
entry: Volcanoes erupt when it barks. Unable to restrain its extreme power, it races headlong around the land.

name: Suicune
entry: Said to be the reincarnation of north winds, it can instantly purify filthy, murky water.

name: Larvitar
entry: It feeds on soil. After it has eaten a large mountain, it will fall asleep so it can grow.

name: Pupitar
entry: Its shell is as hard as sheet rock, and it is also very strong. Its THRASHING can topple a mountain.

name: Tyranitar
entry: Its body can’t be harmed by any sort of attack, so it is very eager to make challenges against enemies.

name: Lugia
entry: It is said that it quietly spends its time deep at the bottom of the sea because its powers are too strong.

name: Ho-Oh
entry: Legends claim this POKéMON flies the world’s skies continuously on its magnificent seven-colored wings.

name: Celebi
entry: This POKéMON wanders across time. Grass and trees flourish in the forests in which it has appeared.

name: Treecko
entry: TREECKO has small hooks on the bottom of its feet that enable it to scale vertical walls. This POKéMON attacks by slamming foes with its thick tail.

name: Grovyle
entry: The leaves growing out of GROVYLE’s body are convenient for camouflaging it from enemies in the forest. This POKéMON is a master at climbing trees in jungles.

name: Sceptile
entry: The leaves growing on SCEPTILE’s body are very sharp edged. This POKéMON is very agile - it leaps all over the branches of trees and jumps on its foe from above or behind.

name: Torchic
entry: TORCHIC sticks with its TRAINER, following behind with unsteady steps. This POKéMON breathes fire of over 1,800 degrees F, including fireballs that leave the foe scorched black.

name: Combusken
entry: COMBUSKEN toughens up its legs and thighs by running through fields and mountains. This POKéMON’s legs possess both speed and power, enabling it to dole out ten kicks in one second.

name: Blaziken
entry: In battle, BLAZIKEN blows out intense flames from its wrists and attacks foes courageously. The stronger the foe, the more intensely this POKéMON’s wrists burn.

name: Mudkip
entry: The fin on MUDKIP’s head acts as highly sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this POKéMON can determine what is taking place around it without using its eyes.

name: Marshtomp
entry: The surface of MARSHTOMP’s body is enveloped by a thin, sticky film that enables it to live on land. This POKéMON plays in mud on beaches when the ocean tide is low.

name: Swampert
entry: SWAMPERT is very strong. It has enough power to easily drag a boulder weighing more than a ton. This POKéMON also has powerful vision that lets it see even in murky water.

name: Poochyena
entry: At first sight, POOCHYENA takes a bite at anything that moves. This POKéMON chases after prey until the victim becomes exhausted. However, it may turn tail if the prey strikes back.

name: Mightyena
entry: MIGHTYENA gives obvious signals when it is preparing to attack. It starts to growl deeply and then flattens its body. This POKéMON will bite savagely with its sharply pointed fangs.

name: Zigzagoon
entry: ZIGZAGOON restlessly wanders everywhere at all times. This POKéMON does so because it is very curious. It becomes interested in anything that it happens to see.

name: Linoone
entry: LINOONE always runs full speed and only in straight lines. If facing an obstacle, it makes a right-angle turn to evade it. This POKéMON is very challenged by gently curving roads.

name: Wurmple
entry: Using the spikes on its rear end, WURMPLE peels the bark off trees and feeds on the sap that oozes out. This POKéMON’s feet are tipped with suction pads that allow it to cling to glass without slipping.

name: Silcoon
entry: SILCOON tethers itself to a tree branch using silk to keep from falling. There, this POKéMON hangs quietly while it awaits evolution. It peers out of the silk cocoon through a small hole.

name: Beautifly
entry: BEAUTIFLY’s favorite food is the sweet pollen of flowers. If you want to see this POKéMON, just leave a potted flower by an open window. BEAUTIFLY is sure to come looking for pollen.

name: Cascoon
entry: CASCOON makes its protective cocoon by wrapping its body entirely with a fine silk from its mouth. Once the silk goes around its body, it hardens. This POKéMON prepares for its evolution inside the cocoon.

name: Dustox
entry: DUSTOX is instinctively drawn to light. Swarms of this POKéMON are attracted by the bright lights of cities, where they wreak havoc by stripping the leaves off roadside trees for food.

name: Lotad
entry: LOTAD live in ponds and lakes, where they float on the surface. It grows weak if its broad leaf dies. On rare occasions, this POKéMON travels on land in search of clean water.

name: Lombre
entry: LOMBRE is nocturnal - it will get active after dusk. It is also a mischief-maker. When this POKéMON spots anglers, it tugs on their fishing lines from beneath the surface and enjoys their consternation.

name: Ludicolo
entry: LUDICOLO begins dancing as soon as it hears cheerful, festive music. This POKéMON is said to appear when it hears the singing of children on hiking outings.

name: Seedot
entry: SEEDOT attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch. The more water it drinks, the glossier this POKéMON’s body becomes.

name: Nuzleaf
entry: NUZLEAF live in densely overgrown forests. They occasionally venture out of the forest to startle people. This POKéMON dislikes having its long nose pinched.

name: Shiftry
entry: SHIFTRY is a mysterious POKéMON that is said to live atop towering trees dating back over a thousand years. It creates terrific windstorms with the fans it holds.

name: Taillow
entry: TAILLOW courageously stands its ground against foes, however strong they may be. This gutsy POKéMON will remain defiant even after a loss. On the other hand, it cries loudly if it becomes hungry.

name: Swellow
entry: SWELLOW flies high above our heads, making graceful arcs in the sky. This POKéMON dives at a steep angle as soon as it spots its prey. The hapless prey is tightly grasped by SWELLOW’s clawed feet, preventing escape.

name: Wingull
entry: WINGULL has the habit of carrying prey and valuables in its beak and hiding them in all sorts of locations. This POKéMON rides the winds and flies as if it were skating across the sky.

name: Pelipper
entry: PELIPPER is a flying transporter that carries small POKéMON and eggs inside its massive bill. This POKéMON builds its nest on steep cliffs facing the sea.

name: Ralts
entry: RALTS senses the emotions of people using the horns on its head. This POKéMON rarely appears before people. But when it does, it draws closer if it senses that the person has a positive disposition.

name: Kirlia
entry: It is said that a KIRLIA that is exposed to the positive emotions of its TRAINER grows beautiful. This POKéMON controls psychokinetic powers with its highly developed brain.

name: Gardevoir
entry: GARDEVOIR has the ability to read the future. If it senses impending danger to its TRAINER, this POKéMON is said to unleash its psychokinetic energy at full power.

name: Surskit
entry: From the tips of its feet, SURSKIT secretes an oil that enables it to walk on water as if it were skating. This POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms in ponds and lakes.

name: Masquerain
entry: MASQUERAIN intimidates enemies with the eyelike patterns on its antennas. This POKéMON flaps its four wings to freely fly in any direction - even sideways and backwards - as if it were a helicopter.

name: Shroomish
entry: SHROOMISH live in damp soil in the dark depths of forests. They are often found keeping still under fallen leaves. This POKéMON feeds on compost that is made up of fallen, rotted leaves.

name: Breloom
entry: BRELOOM closes in on its foe with light and sprightly footwork, then throws punches with its stretchy arms. This POKéMON’s fighting technique puts boxers to shame.

name: Slakoth
entry: SLAKOTH lolls around for over twenty hours every day. Because it moves so little, it does not need much food. This POKéMON’s sole daily meal consists of just three leaves.

name: Vigoroth
entry: VIGOROTH is always itching and agitated to go on a wild rampage. It simply can’t tolerate sitting still for even a minute. This POKéMON’s stress level rises if it can’t be moving constantly.

name: Slaking
entry: SLAKING spends all day lying down and lolling about. It eats grass growing within its reach. If it eats all the grass it can reach, this POKéMON reluctantly moves to another spot.

name: Nincada
entry: NINCADA lives underground for many years in complete darkness. This POKéMON absorbs nutrients from the roots of trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.

name: Ninjask
entry: NINJASK moves around at such a high speed that it cannot be seen, even while its crying can be clearly heard. For that reason, this POKéMON was long believed to be invisible.

name: Shedinja
entry: SHEDINJA’s hard body doesn’t move - not even a twitch. In fact, its body appears to be merely a hollow shell. It is believed that this POKéMON will steal the spirit of anyone peering into its hollow body from its back.

name: Whismur
entry: Normally, WHISMUR’s voice is very quiet - it is barely audible even if one is paying close attention. However, if this POKéMON senses danger, it starts crying at an earsplitting volume.

name: Loudred
entry: LOUDRED’s bellowing can completely decimate a wood-frame house. It uses its voice to punish its foes. This POKéMON’s round ears serve as loudspeakers.

name: Exploud
entry: EXPLOUD triggers earthquakes with the tremors it creates by bellowing. If this POKéMON violently inhales from the ports on its body, it’s a sign that it is preparing to let loose a huge bellow.

name: Makuhita
entry: MAKUHITA is tenacious - it will keep getting up and attacking its foe however many times it is knocked down. Every time it gets back up, this POKéMON stores more energy in its body for evolving.

name: Hariyama
entry: HARIYAMA practices its straight-arm slaps in any number of locations. One hit of this POKéMON’s powerful, openhanded, straight-arm punches could snap a telephone pole in two.

name: Azurill
entry: AZURILL spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum of the throw sends its body flying, too. Using this unique action, one of these POKéMON managed to hurl itself a record 33 feet.

name: Nosepass
entry: NOSEPASS’s magnetic nose is always pointed to the north. If two of these POKéMON meet, they cannot turn their faces to each other when they are close because their magnetic noses repel one another.

name: Skitty
entry: SKITTY has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects and chasing them around. This POKéMON is known to chase after its own tail and become dizzy.

name: Delcatty
entry: DELCATTY prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this POKéMON eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.

name: Sableye
entry: SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside caverns. They are feared, however, because these POKéMON are thought to steal the spirits of people when their eyes burn with a sinister glow in the darkness.

name: Mawile
entry: MAWILE’s huge jaws are actually steel horns that have been transformed. Its docile-looking face serves to lull its foe into letting down its guard. When the foe least expects it, MAWILE chomps it with its gaping jaws.

name: Aron
entry: This POKéMON has a body of steel. To make its body, ARON feeds on iron ore that it digs from mountains. Occasionally, it causes major trouble by eating bridges and rails.

name: Lairon
entry: LAIRON tempers its steel body by drinking highly nutritious mineral springwater until it is bloated. This POKéMON makes its nest close to springs of delicious water.

name: Aggron
entry: AGGRON claims an entire mountain as its own territory. It mercilessly beats up anything that violates its environment. This POKéMON vigilantly patrols its territory at all times.

name: Meditite
entry: Edge_case

name: Medicham
entry: It is said that through meditation, MEDICHAM heightens energy inside its body and sharpens its sixth sense. This POKéMON hides its presence by merging itself with fields and mountains.

name: Electrike
entry: ELECTRIKE stores electricity in its long body hair. This POKéMON stimulates its leg muscles with electric charges. These jolts of power give its legs explosive acceleration performance.

name: Manectric
entry: MANECTRIC is constantly discharging electricity from its mane. The sparks sometimes ignite forest fires. When it enters a battle, this POKéMON creates thunderclouds.

name: Plusle
entry: PLUSLE always acts as a cheerleader for its partners. Whenever a teammate puts out a good effort in battle, this POKéMON shorts out its body to create the crackling noises of sparks to show its joy.

name: Minun
entry: MINUN is more concerned about cheering on its partners than its own safety. It shorts out the electricity in its body to create brilliant showers of sparks to cheer on its teammates.

name: Volbeat
entry: With the arrival of night, VOLBEAT emits light from its tail. It communicates with others by adjusting the intensity and flashing of its light. This POKéMON is attracted by the sweet aroma of ILLUMISE.

name: Illumise
entry: ILLUMISE attracts a swarm of VOLBEAT using a sweet fragrance. Once the VOLBEAT have gathered, this POKéMON leads the lit-up swarm in drawing geometric designs on the canvas of the night sky.

name: Roselia
entry: ROSELIA shoots sharp thorns as projectiles at any opponent that tries to steal the flowers on its arms. The aroma of this POKéMON brings serenity to living things.

name: Gulpin
entry: Virtually all of GULPIN’s body is its stomach. As a result, it can swallow something its own size. This POKéMON’s stomach contains a special fluid that digests anything.

name: Swalot
entry: When SWALOT spots prey, it spurts out a hideously toxic fluid from its pores and sprays the target. Once the prey has weakened, this POKéMON gulps it down whole with its cavernous mouth.

name: Carvanha
entry: CARVANHA’s strongly developed jaws and its sharply pointed fangs pack the destructive power to rip out boat hulls. Many boats have been attacked and sunk by this POKéMON.

name: Sharpedo
entry: Edge_case

name: Wailmer
entry: WAILMER’s nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.

name: Wailord
entry: WAILORD is the largest of all identified POKéMON up to now. This giant POKéMON swims languorously in the vast open sea, eating massive amounts of food at once with its enormous mouth.

name: Numel
entry: NUMEL is extremely dull witted - it doesn’t notice being hit. However, it can’t stand hunger for even a second. This POKéMON’s body is a seething cauldron of boiling magma.

name: Camerupt
entry: CAMERUPT has a volcano inside its body. Magma of 18,000 degrees F courses through its body. Occasionally, the humps on this POKéMON’s back erupt, spewing the superheated magma.

name: Torkoal
entry: TORKOAL digs through mountains in search of coal. If it finds some, it fills hollow spaces on its shell with the coal and burns it. If it is attacked, this POKéMON spouts thick black smoke to beat a retreat.

name: Spoink
entry: SPOINK bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump. As a result, this POKéMON cannot afford to stop bouncing - if it stops, its heart will stop.

name: Grumpig
entry: GRUMPIG uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power waves for gaining total control over its foe. When this POKéMON uses its special power, its snorting breath grows labored.

name: Spinda
entry: All the SPINDA that exist in the world are said to have utterly unique spot patterns. The shaky, tottering steps of this POKéMON give it the appearance of dancing.

name: Trapinch
entry: TRAPINCH’s nest is a sloped, bowl-like pit dug in sand. This POKéMON patiently waits for prey to tumble down the pit. Its giant jaws have enough strength to crush even boulders.

name: Vibrava
entry: To make prey faint, VIBRAVA generates ultrasonic waves by vigorously making its two wings vibrate. This POKéMON’s ultrasonic waves are so powerful, they can bring on headaches in people.

name: Flygon
entry: FLYGON is nicknamed “the elemental spirit of the desert.” Because its flapping wings whip up a cloud of sand, this POKéMON is always enveloped in a sandstorm while flying.

name: Cacnea
entry: CACNEA lives in arid locations such as deserts. It releases a strong aroma from its flower to attract prey. When prey comes near, this POKéMON shoots sharp thorns from its body to bring the victim down.

name: Cacturne
entry: During the daytime, CACTURNE remains unmoving so that it does not lose any moisture to the harsh desert sun. This POKéMON becomes active at night when the temperature drops.

name: Swablu
entry: SWABLU has light and fluffy wings that are like cottony clouds. This POKéMON is not frightened of people. It lands on the heads of people and sits there like a cotton-fluff hat.

name: Altaria
entry: ALTARIA dances and wheels through the sky among billowing, cotton-like clouds. By singing melodies in its crystal-clear voice, this POKéMON makes its listeners experience dreamy wonderment.

name: Zangoose
entry: Memories of battling its arch-rival SEVIPER are etched into every cell of ZANGOOSE’s body. This POKéMON adroitly dodges attacks with incredible agility.

name: Seviper
entry: SEVIPER shares a generations-long feud with ZANGOOSE. The scars on its body are evidence of vicious battles. This POKéMON attacks using its sword-edged tail.

name: Lunatone
entry: LUNATONE was discovered at a location where a meteorite fell. As a result, some people theorize that this POKéMON came from space. However, no one has been able to prove this theory so far.

name: Solrock
entry: SOLROCK is a new species of POKéMON that is said to have fallen from space. It floats in air and moves silently. In battle, this POKéMON releases intensely bright light.

name: Barboach
entry: BARBOACH’s sensitive whiskers serve as a superb radar system. This POKéMON hides in mud, leaving only its two whiskers exposed while it waits for prey to come along.

name: Whiscash
entry: WHISCASH is extremely territorial. Just one of these POKéMON will claim a large pond as its exclusive territory. If a foe approaches it, it thrashes about and triggers a massive earthquake.

name: Corphish
entry: CORPHISH were originally foreign POKéMON that were imported as pets. They eventually turned up in the wild. This POKéMON is very hardy and has greatly increased its population.

name: Crawdaunt
entry: CRAWDAUNT has an extremely violent nature that compels it to challenge other living things to battle. Other life-forms refuse to live in ponds inhabited by this POKéMON, making them desolate places.

name: Baltoy
entry: BALTOY moves while spinning around on its one foot. Primitive wall paintings depicting this POKéMON living among people were discovered in some ancient ruins.

name: Claydol
entry: CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made by primitive humans and brought to life by exposure to a mysterious ray. This POKéMON moves about while levitating.

name: Lileep
entry: LILEEP became extinct approximately a hundred million years ago. This ancient POKéMON attaches itself to a rock on the seafloor and catches approaching prey using tentacles shaped like flower petals.

name: Cradily
entry: CRADILY roams around the ocean floor in search of food. This POKéMON freely extends its tree trunk-like neck and captures unwary prey using its eight tentacles.

name: Anorith
entry: ANORITH was regenerated from a prehistoric fossil. This primitive POKéMON once lived in warm seas. It grips its prey firmly between its two large claws.

name: Armaldo
entry: ARMALDO’s tough armor makes all attacks bounce off. This POKéMON’s two enormous claws can be freely extended or contracted. They have the power to punch right through a steel slab.

name: Feebas
entry: FEEBAS’s fins are ragged and tattered from the start of its life. Because of its shoddy appearance, this POKéMON is largely ignored. It is capable of living in both the sea and in rivers.

name: Milotic
entry: MILOTIC is said to be the most beautiful of all the POKéMON. It has the power to becalm such emotions as anger and hostility to quell bitter feuding.

name: Castform
entry: CASTFORM’s appearance changes with the weather. This POKéMON gained the ability to use the vast power of nature to protect its tiny body.

name: Kecleon
entry: KECLEON is capable of changing its body colors at will to blend in with its surroundings. There is one exception - this POKéMON can’t change the zigzag pattern on its belly.

name: Shuppet
entry: Edge_case

name: Banette
entry: BANETTE generates energy for laying strong curses by sticking pins into its own body. This POKéMON was originally a pitiful plush doll that was thrown away.

name: Duskull
entry: Edge_case

name: Dusclops
entry: DUSCLOPS’s body is completely hollow - there is nothing at all inside. It is said that its body is like a black hole. This POKéMON will absorb anything into its body, but nothing will ever come back out.

name: Tropius
entry: The bunches of fruit around TROPIUS’s neck are very popular with children. This POKéMON loves fruit, and eats it continuously. Apparently, its love for fruit resulted in its own outgrowth of fruit.

name: Chimecho
entry: CHIMECHO makes its cries echo inside its hollow body. When this POKéMON becomes enraged, its cries result in ultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.

name: Absol
entry: Every time ABSOL appears before people, it is followed by a disaster such as an earthquake or a tidal wave. As a result, it came to be known as the disaster POKéMON.

name: Wynaut
entry: WYNAUT can always be seen with a big, happy smile on its face. Look at its tail to determine if it is angry. When angered, this POKéMON will be slapping the ground with its tail.

name: Snorunt
entry: SNORUNT live in regions with heavy snowfall. In seasons without snow, such as spring and summer, this POKéMON steals away to live quietly among stalactites and stalagmites deep in caverns.

name: Glalie
entry: GLALIE has a body made of rock, which it hardens with an armor of ice. This POKéMON has the ability to freeze moisture in the atmosphere into any shape it desires.

name: Spheal
entry: SPHEAL is much faster rolling than walking to get around. When groups of this POKéMON eat, they all clap at once to show their pleasure. Because of this, their mealtimes are noisy.

name: Sealeo
entry: SEALEO has the habit of always juggling on the tip of its nose anything it sees for the first time. This POKéMON occasionally entertains itself by balancing and rolling a SPHEAL on its nose.

name: Walrein
entry: WALREIN’s two massively developed tusks can totally shatter blocks of ice weighing ten tons with one blow. This POKéMON’s thick coat of blubber insulates it from subzero temperatures.

name: Clamperl
entry: CLAMPERL’s sturdy shell is not only good for protection - it is also used for clamping and catching prey. A fully grown CLAMPERL’s shell will be scored with nicks and scratches all over.

name: Huntail
entry: HUNTAIL’s presence went unnoticed by people for a long time because it lives at extreme depths in the sea. This POKéMON’s eyes can see clearly even in the murky dark depths of the ocean.

name: Gorebyss
entry: GOREBYSS lives in the southern seas at extreme depths. Its body is built to withstand the enormous pressure of water at incredible depths. Because of this, this POKéMON’s body is unharmed by ordinary attacks.

name: Relicanth
entry: RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that existed for a hundred million years without ever changing its form. This ancient POKéMON feeds on microscopic organisms with its toothless mouth.

name: Luvdisc
entry: LUVDISC live in shallow seas in the tropics. This heart-shaped POKéMON earned its name by swimming after loving couples it spotted in the ocean’s waves.

name: Bagon
entry: BAGON has a dream of one day soaring in the sky. In doomed efforts to fly, this POKéMON hurls itself off cliffs. As a result of its dives, its head has grown tough and as hard as tempered steel.

name: Shelgon
entry: Inside SHELGON’s armor-like shell, cells are in the midst of transformation to create an entirely new body. This POKéMON’s shell is extremely heavy, making its movements sluggish.

name: Salamence
entry: SALAMENCE came about as a result of a strong, long-held dream of growing wings. It is said that this powerful desire triggered a sudden mutation in this POKéMON’s cells, causing it to sprout its magnificent wings.

name: Beldum
entry: Instead of blood, a powerful magnetic force courses throughout BELDUM’s body. This POKéMON communicates with others by sending controlled pulses of magnetism.

name: Metang
entry: When two BELDUM fuse together, METANG is formed. The brains of the BELDUM are joined by a magnetic nervous system. By linking its brains magnetically, this POKéMON generates strong psychokinetic power.

name: Metagross
entry: METAGROSS has four brains in total. Combined, the four brains can breeze through difficult calculations faster than a supercomputer. This POKéMON can float in the air by tucking in its four legs.

name: Regirock
entry: Edge_case

name: Regice
entry: Edge_case

name: Registeel
entry: REGISTEEL has a body that is harder than any kind of metal. Its body is apparently hollow. No one has any idea what this POKéMON eats.

name: Latias
entry: LATIAS is highly sensitive to the emotions of people. If it senses any hostility, this POKéMON ruffles the feathers all over its body and cries shrilly to intimidate the foe.

name: Latios
entry: LATIOS has the ability to make its foe see an image of what it has seen or imagines in its head. This POKéMON is intelligent and understands human speech.

name: Kyogre
entry: KYOGRE has the power to create massive rain clouds that cover the entire sky and bring about torrential downpours. This POKéMON saved people who were suffering from droughts.

name: Groudon
entry: GROUDON has long been described in mythology as the POKéMON that raised lands and expanded continents. This POKéMON took to sleep after a cataclysmic battle with KYOGRE.

name: Rayquaza
entry: RAYQUAZA lived for hundreds of millions of years in the earth’s ozone layer, never descending to the ground. This POKéMON appears to feed on water and particles in the atmosphere.

name: Jirachi
entry: A legend states that JIRACHI will make true any wish that is written on notes attached to its head when it awakens. If this POKéMON senses danger, it will fight without awakening.

name: Deoxys
entry: The DNA of a space virus underwent a sudden mutation upon exposure to a laser beam and resulted in DEOXYS. The crystalline organ on this POKéMON’s chest appears to be its brain.

name: Turtwig
entry: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

name: Grotle
entry: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

name: Torterra
entry: Small Pokémon occasionally gather on its unmoving back to begin building their nests.

name: Chimchar
entry: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

name: Monferno
entry: To intimidate attackers, it stretches the fire on its tail to make itself appear bigger.

name: Infernape
entry: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

name: Piplup
entry: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

name: Prinplup
entry: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

name: Empoleon
entry: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

name: Starly
entry: They flock in great numbers. Though small, they flap their wings with great power.

name: Staravia
entry: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.

name: Staraptor
entry: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

name: Bidoof
entry: Edge_case

name: Bibarel
entry: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

name: Kricketot
entry: It shakes its head back to front, causing its antennae to hit each other and sound like a xylophone.

name: Kricketune
entry: It crosses its knifelike arms in front of its chest when it cries. It can compose melodies ad lib.

name: Shinx
entry: All of its fur dazzles if danger is sensed. It flees while the foe is momentarily blinded.

name: Luxio
entry: Its claws loose electricity with enough amperage to cause fainting. They live in small groups.

name: Luxray
entry: It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.

name: Budew
entry: Over the winter, it closes its bud and endures the cold. In spring, the bud opens and releases pollen.

name: Roserade
entry: It attracts prey with a sweet aroma, then downs it with thorny whips hidden in its arms.

name: Cranidos
entry: It lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its skull is as hard as iron.

name: Rampardos
entry: Its powerful head butt has enough power to shatter even the most durable things upon impact.

name: Shieldon
entry: A Pokémon that lived in jungles around 100 million years ago. Its facial hide is extremely hard.

name: Bastiodon
entry: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

name: Burmy
entry: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Wormadam
entry: When BURMY evolved, its cloak became a part of this Pokémon’s body. The cloak is never shed.

name: Mothim
entry: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.

name: Combee
entry: A Pokémon formed by three others. It busily carries sweet floral honey to VESPIQUEN.

name: Vespiquen
entry: Its abdomen is a honeycomb for grubs. It raises its grubs on honey collected by COMBEE.

name: Pachirisu
entry: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

name: Buizel
entry: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

name: Floatzel
entry: It floats using its well-developed flotation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

name: Cherubi
entry: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for evolution. Apparently, it is very sweet and tasty.

name: Cherrim
entry: It blooms during times of strong sunlight. It tries to make up for everything it endured as a bud.

name: Shellos
entry: Its colors and shapes differ from region to region. In the Sinnoh region, two types are confirmed.

name: Gastrodon
entry: It has a pliable body without any bones. If any part of its body is torn off, it grows right back.

name: Ambipom
entry: To eat, it deftly shucks nuts with its two tails. It rarely uses its arms now.

name: Drifloon
entry: A Pokémon formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It loves damp, humid seasons.

name: Drifblim
entry: It’s drowzy in daytime, but flies off in the evening in big groups. No one knows where they go.

name: Buneary
entry: It slams foes by sharply uncoiling its rolled ears. It stings enough to make a grown-up cry in pain.

name: Lopunny
entry: An extremely cautious Pokémon. It cloaks its body with its fluffy ear fur when it senses danger.

name: Mismagius
entry: Its cries sound like incantations. Those hearing it are tormented by headaches and hallucinations.

name: Honchkrow
entry: Becoming active at night, it is known to swarm with numerous MURKROW in tow.

name: Glameow
entry: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

name: Purugly
entry: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon’s nest and claims it as its own.

name: Chingling
entry: It emits cries by agitating an orb at the back of its throat. It moves with flouncing hops.

name: Stunky
entry: It protects itself by spraying a noxious fluid from its rear. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

name: Skuntank
entry: It sprays a vile-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail to attack. Its range is over 160 feet.

name: Bronzor
entry: Implements shaped like it were discovered in ancient tombs. It is unknown if they are related.

name: Bronzong
entry: One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

name: Bonsly
entry: It looks as if it is always crying. It is actually adjusting its body’s fluid levels by eliminating excess.

name: Mime Jr.
entry: Edge_case

name: Happiny
entry: It loves round white things. It carries an egg-shaped rock in imitation of CHANSEY.

name: Chatot
entry: It can learn and speak human words. If they gather, they all learn the same saying.

name: Spiritomb
entry: A Pokémon that was formed by 108 spirits. It is bound to a fissure in an odd keystone.

name: Gible
entry: It nests in small, horizontal holes in cave walls. It pounces to catch prey that stray too close.

name: Gabite
entry: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scales will heal even incurable illnesses.

name: Garchomp
entry: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

name: Munchlax
entry: It wolfs down its weight in food once a day, swallowing food whole with almost no chewing.

name: Riolu
entry: The aura that emanates from its body intensifies to alert others if it is afraid or sad.

name: Lucario
entry: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It understands human speech.

name: Hippopotas
entry: It lives in arid places. Instead of perspiration, it expels grainy sand from its body.

name: Hippowdon
entry: It blasts internally stored sand from ports on its body to create a towering twister for attack.

name: Skorupi
entry: It grips prey with its tail claws and injects poison. It tenaciously hangs on until the poison takes.

name: Drapion
entry: It has the power in its clawed arms to make scrap of a car. The tips of its claws release poison.

name: Croagunk
entry: Its cheeks hold poison sacs. It tries to catch foes off guard to jab them with toxic fingers.

name: Toxicroak
entry: Its knuckle claws secrete a toxin so vile that even a scratch could prove fatal.

name: Carnivine
entry: It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

name: Finneon
entry: After long exposure to sunlight, the patterns on its tail fins shine vividly when darkness arrives.

name: Lumineon
entry: It lives on the deep-sea floor. It attracts prey by flashing the patterns on its four tail fins.

name: Mantyke
entry: A friendly Pokémon that captures the subtle flows of seawater using its two antennae.

name: Snover
entry: It lives on snowy mountains. Having had little contact with humans, it is boldly inquisitive.

name: Abomasnow
entry: It whips up blizzards in mountains that are always buried in snow. It is the abominable snowman.

name: Weavile
entry: They live in cold regions, forming groups of four or five that hunt prey with impressive coordination.

name: Magnezone
entry: It evolved from exposure to a special magnetic field. Three units generate magnetism.

name: Lickilicky
entry: It wraps things with its extensible tongue. Getting too close to it will leave you soaked with drool.

name: Rhyperior
entry: It puts rocks in holes in its palms and uses its muscles to shoot them. GEODUDE are shot at rare times.

name: Tangrowth
entry: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

name: Electivire
entry: It pushes the tips of its two tails against the foe, then lets loose with over 20,000 volts of power.

name: Magmortar
entry: It blasts fireballs of over 3,600 degrees F from the ends of its arms. It lives in volcanic craters.

name: Togekiss
entry: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

name: Yanmega
entry: By churning its wings, it creates shock waves that inflict critical internal injuries to foes.

name: Leafeon
entry: Just like a plant, it uses photosynthesis. As a result, it is always enveloped in clear air.

name: Glaceon
entry: As a protective technique, it can completely freeze its fur to make its hairs stand like needles.

name: Gliscor
entry: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: Mamoswine
entry: Its impressive tusks are made of ice. The population thinned when it turned warm after the ice age.

name: Porygon-Z
entry: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

name: Gallade
entry: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on its elbows.

name: Probopass
entry: It exudes strong magnetism from all over. It controls three small units called Mini-Noses.

name: Dusknoir
entry: The antenna on its head captures radio waves from the world of spirits that command it to take people there.

name: Froslass
entry: It freezes foes with an icy breath nearly -60 degrees F. What seems to be its body is actually hollow.

name: Rotom
entry: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

name: Uxie
entry: Known as “The Being of Knowledge.” It is said that it can wipe out the memory of those who see its eyes.

name: Mesprit
entry: Known as “The Being of Emotion.” It taught humans the nobility of sorrow, pain, and joy.

name: Azelf
entry: Known as “The Being of Willpower.” It sleeps at the bottom of a lake to keep the world in balance.

name: Dialga
entry: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

name: Palkia
entry: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

name: Heatran
entry: It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

name: Regigigas
entry: There is an enduring legend that states this Pokémon towed continents with ropes.

name: Giratina
entry: A Pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.

name: Cresselia
entry: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

name: Phione
entry: A Pokémon that lives in warm seas. It inflates the flotation sac on its head to drift and search for food.

name: Manaphy
entry: Born on a cold seafloor, it will swim great distances to return to its birthplace.

name: Darkrai
entry: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: Shaymin
entry: It lives in flower patches and avoids detection by curling up to look like a flowering plant.

name: Arceus
entry: It is described in mythology as the Pokémon that shaped the universe with its 1,000 arms.

name: Victini
entry: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.

name: Snivy
entry: It is very intelligent and calm. Being exposed to lots of sunlight makes its movements swifter.

name: Servine
entry: It moves along the ground as if sliding. Its swift movements befuddle its foes, and it then attacks with a vine whip.

name: Serperior
entry: It can stop its opponents’ movements with just a glare. It takes in solar energy and boosts it internally.

name: Tepig
entry: It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it eats them.

name: Pignite
entry: When its internal fire flares up, its movements grow sharper and faster. When in trouble, it emits smoke.

name: Emboar
entry: It can throw a fire punch by setting its fists on fire with its fiery chin. It cares deeply about its friends.

name: Oshawott
entry: It fights using the scalchop on its stomach. In response to an attack, it retaliates immediately by slashing.

name: Dewott
entry: Strict training is how it learns its flowing double-scalchop technique.

name: Samurott
entry: One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of them quiets everybody.

name: Patrat
entry: Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep watch for days. They use their tails to communicate with others.

name: Watchog
entry: When they see an enemy, their tails stand high, and they spit the seeds of berries stored in their cheek pouches.

name: Lillipup
entry: It faces strong opponents with great courage. But, when at a disadvantage in a fight, this intelligent Pokémon flees.

name: Herdier
entry: It has black, cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.

name: Stoutland
entry: It rescues people stranded by blizzards in the mountains. Its shaggy fur shields it from the cold.

name: Purrloin
entry: They steal from people for fun, but their victims can’t help but forgive them. Their deceptively cute act is perfect.

name: Liepard
entry: These Pokémon vanish and appear unexpectedly. Many Trainers are drawn to their beautiful form and fur.

name: Pansage
entry: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

name: Simisage
entry: Ill tempered, it fights by swinging its barbed tail around wildly. The leaf growing on its head is very bitter.

name: Pansear
entry: When it is angered, the temperature of its head tuft reaches 600° F. It uses its tuft to roast berries.

name: Simisear
entry: It loves sweets because they become energy for the fire burning inside its body.

name: Panpour
entry: The water stored inside the tuft on its head is full of nutrients. Plants that receive its water grow large.

name: Simipour
entry: The tuft on its head holds water. When the level runs low, it replenishes the tuft by siphoning up water with its tail.

name: Munna
entry: Munna always float in the air. People whose dreams are eaten by them forget what the dreams had been about.

name: Musharna
entry: The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.

name: Pidove
entry: Each follows its Trainer’s orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.

name: Tranquill
entry: It can return to its Trainer’s location regardless of the distance separating them.

name: Unfezant
entry: Males swing their head plumage to threaten opponents. The females’ flying abilities surpass those of the males.

name: Blitzle
entry: Its mane shines when it discharges electricity. They use their flashing manes to communicate with one another.

name: Zebstrika
entry: They have lightning-like movements. When Zebstrika run at full speed, the sound of thunder reverberates.

name: Roggenrola
entry: Its ear is hexagonal in shape. Compressed underground, its body is as hard as steel.

name: Boldore
entry: When it overflows with power, the orange crystal on its body glows. It looks for underground water in caves.

name: Gigalith
entry: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

name: Woobat
entry: Its habitat is dark forests and caves. It emits ultrasonic waves from its nose to learn about its surroundings.

name: Swoobat
entry: It emits sound waves of various frequencies from its nose, including some powerful enough to destroy rocks.

name: Drilbur
entry: It can dig through the ground at a speed of 30 mph. It could give a car running aboveground a good race.

name: Excadrill
entry: It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has evolved into steel strong enough to bore through iron plates.

name: Audino
entry: It touches others with the feelers on its ears, using the sound of their heartbeats to tell how they are feeling.

name: Timburr
entry: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.

name: Gurdurr
entry: This Pokémon is so muscular and strongly built that even a group of wrestlers could not make it budge an inch.

name: Conkeldurr
entry: It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

name: Tympole
entry: They warn others of danger by vibrating their cheeks to create a high-pitched sound.

name: Palpitoad
entry: When they vibrate the bumps on their heads, they can make waves in water or earthquake-like vibrations on land.

name: Seismitoad
entry: They shoot paralyzing liquid from their head bumps. They use vibration to hurt their opponents.

name: Throh
entry: When it tightens its belt, it becomes stronger. Wild Throh use vines to weave their own belts.

name: Sawk
entry: The sound of Sawk punching boulders and trees can be heard all the way from the mountains where they train.

name: Sewaddle
entry: Leavanny dress it in clothes they made for it when it hatched. It hides its head in its hood while it is sleeping.

name: Swadloon
entry: Forests where Swadloon live have superb foliage because the nutrients they make from fallen leaves nourish the plant life.

name: Leavanny
entry: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

name: Venipede
entry: Its bite injects a potent poison, enough to paralyze large bird Pokémon that try to prey on it.

name: Whirlipede
entry: Protected by a hard shell, it spins its body like a wheel and crashes furiously into its enemies.

name: Scolipede
entry: With quick movements, it chases down its foes, attacking relentlessly with its horns until it prevails.

name: Cottonee
entry: When attacked, it escapes by shooting cotton from its body. The cotton serves as a decoy to distract the attacker.

name: Whimsicott
entry: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.

name: Petilil
entry: The leaves on its head are very bitter. Eating one of these leaves is known to refresh a tired body.

name: Lilligant
entry: Even veteran Trainers face a challenge in getting its beautiful flower to bloom. This Pokémon is popular with celebrities.

name: Basculin
entry: Red and blue Basculin get along so poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly. These Pokémon are very hostile.

name: Sandile
entry: They live buried in the sands of the desert. The sun-warmed sands prevent their body temperature from dropping.

name: Krokorok
entry: They live in groups of a few individuals. Protective membranes shield their eyes from sandstorms.

name: Krookodile
entry: They never allow prey to escape. Their jaws are so powerful, they can crush the body of an automobile.

name: Darumaka
entry: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.

name: Darmanitan
entry: Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F, making enough power that it can destroy a dump truck with one punch.

name: Maractus
entry: It uses an up-tempo song and dance to drive away the bird Pokémon that prey on its flower seeds.

name: Dwebble
entry: This Pokémon can easily melt holes in hard rocks with a liquid secreted from its mouth.

name: Crustle
entry: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser of the battle.

name: Scraggy
entry: Its skin has a rubbery elasticity, so it can reduce damage by defensively pulling its skin up to its neck.

name: Scrafty
entry: Groups of them beat up anything that enters their territory. Each can spit acidic liquid from its mouth.

name: Sigilyph
entry: They never vary the route they fly, because their memories of guarding an ancient city remain steadfast.

name: Yamask
entry: Each of them carries a mask that used to be its face when it was human. Sometimes they look at it and cry.

name: Cofagrigus
entry: It has been said that they swallow those who get too close and turn them into mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

name: Tirtouga
entry: Restored from a fossil, this Pokémon can dive to depths beyond half a mile.

name: Carracosta
entry: They can live both in the ocean and on land. A slap from one of them is enough to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

name: Archen
entry: Said to be an ancestor of bird Pokémon, they were unable to fly and moved about by hopping from one branch to another.

name: Archeops
entry: They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

name: Trubbish
entry: Inhaling the gas they belch will make you sleep for a week. They prefer unsanitary places.

name: Garbodor
entry: It clenches opponents with its left arm and finishes them off with foul-smelling poison gas belched from its mouth.

name: Zorua
entry: It changes into the forms of others to surprise them. Apparently, it often transforms into a silent child.

name: Zoroark
entry: Bonds between these Pokémon are very strong. It protects the safety of its pack by tricking its opponents.

name: Minccino
entry: They greet one another by rubbing each other with their tails, which are always kept well groomed and clean.

name: Cinccino
entry: Their white fur is coated in a special oil that makes it easy for them to deflect attacks.

name: Gothita
entry: Their ribbonlike feelers increase their psychic power. They are always staring at something.

name: Gothorita
entry: They use hypnosis to control people and Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading people astray are told in every corner.

name: Gothitelle
entry: Starry skies thousands of light-years away are visible in the space distorted by their intense psychic power.

name: Solosis
entry: They drive away attackers by unleashing psychic power. They can use telepathy to talk with others.

name: Duosion
entry: Since they have two divided brains, at times they suddenly try to take two different actions at once.

name: Reuniclus
entry: When Reuniclus shake hands, a network forms between their brains, increasing their psychic power.

name: Ducklett
entry: These bird Pokémon are excellent divers. They swim around in the water eating their favorite food--peat moss.

name: Swanna
entry: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

name: Vanillite
entry: The temperature of their breath is -58° F. They create snow crystals and make snow fall in the areas around them.

name: Vanillish
entry: Snowy mountains are this Pokémon’s habitat. During an ancient ice age, they moved to southern areas.

name: Vanilluxe
entry: Swallowing large amounts of water, they make snow clouds inside their bodies and attack their foes with violent blizzards.

name: Deerling
entry: The color and scent of their fur changes to match the mountain grass. When they sense hostility, they hide in the grass.

name: Sawsbuck
entry: They migrate according to the seasons. People can tell the season by looking at Sawsbuck’s horns.

name: Emolga
entry: The energy made in its cheeks’ electric pouches is stored inside its membrane and released while it is gliding.

name: Karrablast
entry: These mysterious Pokémon evolve when they receive electrical stimulation while they are in the same place as Shelmet.

name: Escavalier
entry: They fly around at high speed, striking with their pointed spears. Even when in trouble, they face opponents bravely.

name: Foongus
entry: It lures people in with its Poké Ball pattern, then releases poison spores. Why it resembles a Poké Ball is unknown.

name: Amoonguss
entry: It lures prey close by dancing and waving its arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a swaying motion.
